info.title: core

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and not localized); example: Service Unavailable

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: There was an error processing the request

agid_psp.description: True if the PSP is internal

ci_owner.description: Fiscal code of the Creditor Institution who owns the iban

description.description: The description the Creditor Institution gives to the iban about its usage

is_active.description: True if the iban is active

validity_date.description: The date the Creditor Institution wants the iban to be used for its payments

publication_date.description: The date on which the iban has been inserted in the system

due_date.description: The date on which the iban will expire

labels.description: The labels array associated with the iban

description.example: The IBAN to use for CUP payments

IbanLabel.description: The labels array associated with the iban

flag_psp_cp.description: Represents the authorization to carry out the transfer of the information present in additional payment information in the tags relating to payment by card for the PA in V1

detail.example: Invalid content was found starting with element 'idBancaSeller'. One of '{ibanAccredito}' is expected. Error at lineNumber: 10

code_type.description: BARCODE_GS1_128 is deprecated and not allowed

limit.description: Required number of items per page

items_found.description: Number of items found. (The last page may have fewer elements than required)

validity_date.description: The date until which the iban is valid

publication_date.description: The publication date of the iban

ApiKey.description: The API key to access this function app.
ApiKey.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

Authorization.description: JWT token get after Azure Login
